body.name: Anpviz 6MP PoE Wide Angle Security Camera Outdoor, Panoramic 180° Dual-Lens IP Bullet Camera with Human/Vehicle Detection, Starlight Sensor, Two Way Talk, Built-in MicroSD Card Slot
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Uniwatch US Direct and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【Panoramic Security Camera】 The 180° dual-lens design provides an immersive view of your outdoor surroundings, capturing every detail with a single camera. Perfect for monitoring large outdoor areas, this camera ensures that nothing goes unnoticed.

【Motion Detection and Warning】 Equipped with person and vehicle detection, this wide angle security camera can differentiate between objects to prevent false alarms. When motion is detected, in addition to sending push notifications to your phone, the camera also has flashing lights and speakers to alert people and cars that they are being recorded.

【Two-Way Talk】 The dual lens security camera comes with a built-in speaker and microphone, enabling you to communicate with visitors or potential intruders. You can warn them to leave your property or answer the doorbell remotely from anywhere.

【Crystal Clear Night Vision】 With 100ft of high-definition night vision, the ip camera 180 degree can capture clear and detailed images in low light conditions. Experience crystal clear images even in low-light conditions with our advanced security camera featuring Starlight sensor technology.

【Multiple Remote Access 】 With the free Guarding Vision App on your smartphone, you can keep an eye on your home or business from anywhere, as long as you have an internet connection. You can also access real-time viewing and playback through a free PC client, IVMS4200, on smart devices (iOS/Android) or Mac and Windows, supporting simultaneous viewing by multiple users on different devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 6MP 180°Panorama 2 Starlight senor 3 Night Vision up to 100ft 4 Intelligent WDR Function

Previous page Take swift action against intruders Once suspicious activity is detected, strobe lights and audio alarms will immediately activate. Focus on what really matters It can detect the movement of people/vehicles within the area, reducing false alarms. Mass false alarms are a thing of the past Important detection areas can be filtered by setting the area Intelligent Segmentation Important areas can be inspected by drawing lines Next page 1 light &Audio Warning 2 Motion Detection 2.0 3 Entrance / Exit Detection 4 Line Crossing Detection

Previous page Withstands Harsh Weather Rated as IP67 weatherproof, the camera continues to function even being immersed in 1 m of water . Multiple Storage Options Camera records to 256GB SD card (excl.), saves to NAS or NVR for your preference. Saving Solution for High-Quality Images Unlike H.264, H.265+ saves up to 75% storage space while keeping vivid image quality! Easy Plug & Play PoE Setup Connect the PoE surveillance video camera to the NVR with just a single network cable . Next page 1 Outdoor IP67 Weatherproof 2 Multiple Recording Opts 3 Save Storage Space 4 Easy setup

Two-Way Communication With the built-in microphone and speaker of this product, you can have real-time communication with your family or visitors. Say "hello" to your loved ones and friends, communicate with the delivery person, or issue warnings to suspicious individuals in emergency situations. Multi-User Remote Access Access and control the camera via your phones, PCs and tablets for Super HD stream and playback.Allow your family members, friends, or employees to view the live feed and recorded videos with just a few clicks.

Does this camera support color night vision? It does not support full color night vision, but the camera has a Starlight sensor which allows you to see color images even in low-light conditions. Is this onvif compliant? This camera supports Onvif. What AI detection features does this camera have? In addition to Human and vehicle detection, the camera also supports Line Crossing Detection, Entrance / Exit Detection, Intrusion Detection. Does this camera support cloud storage? This camera does not currently support cloud storage. Can this camera be used alone? Yes, this camera comes with an SD card slot (up to 256G) and can be used alone, or it can be used in conjunction with our Anpviz NVR(B07T829M5V,B07Z9C1ZJQ) for plug-and-play functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wide FOV + Build Quality
reviews.reviewText: I was initially interested in this camera because I have a wide area that I’d ideally want one camera to cover, and none of my other “wide FOV” PoE cameras fit the job (those cameras were advertised as 130 degree FOV).This dual lens camera has an incredibly wide FOV, perfect for my use case. Build quality is also excellent - the housing is metal and the mounting plate is well designed. Downside is that the unit is considerably bigger than the other single-lens turret cameras that I own. The mounting footprint is larger and it extends from the mounting surface farther. Included a photo with a lemon for scale.Setup with my NVR was pretty straightforward. The instructions were pretty clear about how to initialize the camera, and after setup my NVR connected through ONVIF.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality Camera
reviews.reviewText: Shipping and delivery were prompt. The Camera is built very solid. The picture is excellent and the field of view is as wide as I have ever seen. I am very happy with this Camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super WIDE angle
reviews.reviewText: Great coverage for our back pool deck. Reaches a real 180° and at full resolution is sharp. Night view is great as well. Thinking of getting another for the side of the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the camera is very good, and the digital stitching works pretty well to give you one large image from the two cameras. This camera has a starlight sensor so it handles color night vision pretty well if there is a small light source. Unfortunately this camera only has IR LEDs, and forcing it to not switch to black and white mode is a bit cumbersome using its configuration options. The best you can really do is to manually schedule it so it only switches to black and white IR night vision for only 10 seconds at a specified time. Given how good the color night vision is when placed in an area where white lights already exist, if only it came with the option for enabling regular white LEDs instead if IR it would be much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Amazing How This Works!
reviews.reviewText: The camera is Amazing! - What a great view, easy to set up, easy to install and crazy good picture!! Just purchased two more and will be buying even more than that. Very easy to use software also. The dual camera merge is near perfect! Almost flawless! Highly recommend this camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Update: Failed when needed most
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: This negates all the good that I previously wrote about this camera. I had it set up to record to the SD card I installed. It had been correctly formatted through the app and appeared to be working fine. I only realized when I tried to view the footage that THE CAMERA HAS RECORDED NOTHING. Whatever format it made the SD card, it is unreadable by anything, including its own app. Tried from mobile and PC. The whole point of a camera like this is to be able to view the footage. So disappointed that when I really needed the footage, it was not there. Returning this.This camera is AMAZING. The field of view is something I didn't even think was possible. It covers the entire front of my property left to right and top to bottom. Not to mention that the picture quality is impeccable. I did have some issues with the set up and getting motion detection to work, but the seller was extremely responsive and helped me solve all of those issues. I am as pleased as can be with this camera and actually took my other cameras down because they were no longer needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent night vision
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up good quality picture and excellent night vision the 180 degree view covers the entire front of my house this is my second one and I am happy so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Built like a tank & good image
reviews.reviewText: This camera seems to be a rebranded Hikvision so the software is very customizable, this is not an easy camera to set up but the benefit is solid reliable performance.The vertical view angle is larger than the DUO 2. The resolution is also higher vertically. Horizontal FOV is the same, obv. Framerate is quite low.The mount is amazing the the all-metal construction seems like it will last a very long time, a stark contrast with the Duo2 which is all plastic.RTSP connection is flawless and it has many settings for stream compression allowing to adapt to any NVR.Starlight sensor is very sensitive despite the low power IR LED, this gives a longer range than the Duo 2Image quality is not that great with a lot of bleeding but there is WDR so you will get the information.Sound quality is terrible stock so you have to change it to AAC and turn off ambient filter.This is by far the best 180 camera I have tested and I think this will last as long as the RLC 410.
